ygData.subject: RE: Lets find Bidl Frugin
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually the lens of Borxx is for the observer staff quest. Trust Me the staff is awesome, so much so you can easily get 1000 plat for the lens Borxx drops
ygData.messageBody:
Actually the lens of Borxx is for the observer staff quest. Trust Me the
staff is awesome, so much so you can easily get 1000 plat for the lens Borxx
drops from a caster who wants to turn it in for the observer staff. Its not
part of the four lens quest. So that is an example of a quest that has a
very sweet reward compared to what you have to do to get it.

Sincerely,

Eloric D'Mortifer


-----Original Message-----
From: Nosferatu [mailto:nosferatu@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 22, 1999 11:28 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Lets find Bidl Frugin


From: Nosferatu <nosferatu@...>

Believe it , verant has this sick and twisted thing about making quests
ungettable at higher levels, and impossible for low levels to actually
solve, for instance this quest. one of the lens you need tog et from
Borxx, a level *30*+ Evil Eye. With verants normal sense of rewards well
get 20 exp pts, a faction adjustment and a tarnished dagger as reward,
note this is a step up from the usual rusty dagger they give us.
another example (again gnome) get tergons spellbook, OK this spawns on
a level 18 or so mob... your reward for solving the quest? a level 4
mage spell.
/Nos

MadGrizzle wrote:
>
> From: MadGrizzle <MadGrizzle@...>
>
> I can't believe that if Bidl Frugin is in the Steamfont cave, that he
would
> be too deep.
> This quest is supposed to be completed by level 12s or maybe up to
> 16. Those guards are level 40 or so, i hear, and Meldrath charms. If he
> spawned, it would be near where the other slaves are. I did see a mob in
> there though. Can't remember his name, Londoor or something. I've seen
> him walking through Steamfont attacking rogue clocks. He ignored me when
i
> hailed and walked straight into the mine.
>
> At 10:23 AM 07/22/1999 -0400, you wrote:
> >From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
> >
> >Hmm, good idea.
> >
> >I have a few thoughts on this as well. Bidl Frugin may indeed be located
in
> >the Steamfont Mino's cave. I have a feeling that the guards may whack
him as
> >soon as he spawns, much like Bandits will kill Giant Spiders and Bears in
the
> >Karanas. Not sure about this, but its a thought. Secondly, is the lens
quest
> >class specific? What generic gnome quests exist out there? Brewing is
> >another trade skill that is very quest related, so I think that this is a
good
> >avenue to pursue.
> >
> >Cheers
> >Malkin Fennin Ro
